entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
